definitions.definition: keep safe from harm or injury.
examples: he tried to protect Kelly from the attack
synonyms: keep; inoculate "they fought to protect their homes and families"

definitions.definition: aim to preserve (a threatened plant or animal species) by legislating against collecting or hunting.
restrict by law access to or development of (land) so as to preserve its natural state.
examples: logging is continuing in protected areas in violation of an international agreement

definitions.definition: (of an insurance policy) promise to pay (someone) an agreed amount in the event of loss, injury, fire, theft, or other misfortune.
examples: in the event of your death, your family will be protected against any financial problems that may arise

definitions.definition: shield (a domestic industry) from competition by imposing import duties on foreign goods.
restrict access to or use of (data or a memory location).
examples: security products are designed to protect information from unauthorized access
